scripts.build: next build && next-sitemap --config next-sitemap.config.cjs && node scripts/gerarFeed.cjs
scripts.index-bing: npx indexnow-submit submit-urls public/indexnowlist.txt --host comprar.blendibox.com.br --engine bing.com --key-file public/c64210b2794a4cbfbe6a7969e89847ff.txt --key c64210b2794a4cbfbe6a7969e89847ff
scripts.predeploy: next build && next-sitemap --config next-sitemap.config.cjs && node scripts/gerarFeed.js
